speaker: char
text: Hello darling, what a lovely place you have here.

speaker: char
text: I’ve heard such good things. Let’s see if you live up to your name.

speaker: char
text: What do I need? To look beautiful, of course. Well, even more beautiful than now.

speaker: char
text: Just keep looking at me through a mirror, be really careful about that. I don’t want you to end up like all of my last dates. They can never resist looking at me and turning to stone.

speaker: char
text: Please make sure you apply makeup to all my faces. Yes, the snakes too of course!
